title: Ownership - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/25/21
itunes:title: Ownership - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/25/21
description:
George Noory and author Jim Salzman explore his research into how the rules of ownership of items like toys, Netflix passwords and airline seats create unwritten standards of personal behavior that determine how people interact with each other.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
